languages.text: Скверна, зревшая в чреве Кьявы Гамма, выползала из теней постепенно. Щупальца ее проникали в цех за цехом, опутывали магоса за магосом. Искажались слова бинарных мантр, преступался алгоритмический катехизис. Под стальной скорлупой свернулся мерзкий червь зла.

The foulness that festered in the depths of Kiava Gamma was patient. Its tentacles crept into workshop after workshop, capturing Magos after Magos. The words of binharic mantras were distorted and the algorithmic catechism was compromised. Beneath the shell of iron, a vile worm gnawed at the world's heart.
languages.original_text: Скверна, зревшая в чреве Кьявы Гамма, выползала из теней постепенно. Щупальца ее проникали в цех за цехом, опутывали магоса за магосом. Искажались слова бинарных мантр, преступался алгоритмический катехизис. Под стальной скорлупой свернулся мерзкий червь зла.

traits.locale_text: The foulness that was brewing in the womb of Kiava Gamma was slow to manifest. Its tentacles crept into workshop after workshop, entangled Magos after Magos. The words of binary mantras were distorted, the algorithmic catechism was compromised. Beneath the shell of iron, a vile worm was gnawing at the world's heart.

The foulness that was brewing in the womb of Kiava Gamma was slow to manifest. Its tentacles crept into workshop after workshop, entangled Magos after Magos. The words of binary mantras were distorted, the algorithmic catechism was compromised. Beneath the shell of iron, a vile worm was gnawing at the world's heart.

The foulness that was brewing in the depths of Kiava Gamma was slow to manifest. Its tentacles crept into workshop after workshop, capturing Magos after Magos. The words of binharic mantras were distorted and the algorithmic catechism was compromised. Beneath the shell of iron, a vile worm was gnawing at the world's heart.

The foulness that was brewing in the depths of Kiava Gamma was slow to manifest. Its tentacles crept into workshop after workshop, capturing Magos after Magos. The words of binharic mantras were distorted and the algorithmic catechism was compromised. Beneath the shell of iron, a vile worm was gnawing at the world's heart.

The foulness that festered in the depths of Kiava Gamma was patient. Its tentacles crept into workshop after workshop, capturing Magos after Magos. The words of binharic mantras were distorted and the algorithmic catechism was compromised. Beneath the shell of iron, a vile worm gnawed at the world's heart.

languages.text: 基亚瓦伽马星深处不断酝酿的邪恶之物始终保持着耐心。它的触手潜入了一个又一个车间，腐化了一位又一位贤者。二进制语的祷文遭到了扭曲，算法教义也遭到了破坏。在钢铁的外壳之下，邪恶的蠹虫正在不断啃食这个世界的心脏。
languages.original_text: The foulness that festered in the depths of Kiava Gamma was patient. Its tentacles crept into workshop after workshop, capturing Magos after Magos. The words of binharic mantras were distorted and the algorithmic catechism was compromised. Beneath the shell of iron, a vile worm gnawed at the world's heart.

traits.locale_text: 基亚瓦伽马星深处不断酝酿的邪恶之物始终没有暴露在外。它的触手潜入了一个又一个车间，腐化了一位又一位贤者。二进制语的祷文遭到了扭曲，算法教义也遭到了破坏。在钢铁的外壳之下，邪恶的蠹虫正在不断啃食这个世界的心脏。

languages.text: キアヴァ・ガンマの深部に蔓延る魔物は忍耐強かった。その魔の手は工房から工房へと伸び、マゴスを次から次へと捕らえていった。2進法のマントラの言葉は歪められ、アルゴリズムの要理は損なわれた。鉄の外殻の下で、蛆虫が惑星の心臓をかじっていた。
languages.original_text: The foulness that festered in the depths of Kiava Gamma was patient. Its tentacles crept into workshop after workshop, capturing Magos after Magos. The words of binharic mantras were distorted and the algorithmic catechism was compromised. Beneath the shell of iron, a vile worm gnawed at the world's heart.

traits.locale_text: キアヴァ・ガンマの深部で醸成された醜悪さがゆっくりと姿を現した。その魔の手は工房から工房へと伸び、マゴスを次から次へと捕らえていった。2進法のマントラの言葉は歪められ、アルゴリズムの要理は損なわれた。鉄の外殻の下で、蛆虫が惑星の心臓をかじっていた。

languages.text: L'immonde créature qui suppurait dans les profondeurs de Kiava Gamma était patiente. Ses tentacules s'insinuèrent dans les ateliers l'un après l'autre, capturant les magos un par un. Les mots des mantras binhaires furent déformés et le catéchisme algorithmique fut compromis. Sous la croûte de fer, un ver ignoble dévorait le cœur du monde.
languages.original_text: The foulness that festered in the depths of Kiava Gamma was patient. Its tentacles crept into workshop after workshop, capturing Magos after Magos. The words of binharic mantras were distorted and the algorithmic catechism was compromised. Beneath the shell of iron, a vile worm gnawed at the world's heart.

traits.locale_text: La créature immonde qui grandissait dans les profondeurs de Kiava Gamma mit du temps à se manifester. Ses tentacules s'insinuèrent dans les ateliers l'un après l'autre, capturant les magos un par un. Les mots des mantras binhaires furent déformés et le catéchisme algorithmique fut compromis. Sous la croûte de fer, un ver ignoble dévorait le cœur du monde.

languages.text: La maldad que supuraba en las profundidades de Kiava fue paciente. Sus tentáculos se introdujeron en un taller tras otro, capturando a sus Magos. Las palabras de los mantras binarios quedaron distorsionadas y el catecismo algorítmico se perdió. Bajo la cúpula de hierro, un gusano nauseabundo devoraba lentamente el corazón del planeta.
languages.original_text: The foulness that festered in the depths of Kiava Gamma was patient. Its tentacles crept into workshop after workshop, capturing Magos after Magos. The words of binharic mantras were distorted and the algorithmic catechism was compromised. Beneath the shell of iron, a vile worm gnawed at the world's heart.

traits.locale_text: La maldad que crecía en las profundidades de Kiava tardó en manifestarse. Sus tentáculos se introdujeron en un taller tras otro, capturando a sus magos. Las palabras de los mantras binarios quedaron distorsionadas y el catecismo algorítmico se perdió. Bajo la cúpula de hierro, un gusano nauseabundo devoraba lentamente el corazón del planeta.

languages.text: Die Fäulnis, die in den Tiefen von Kiava Gamma schwelte, war geduldig. Ihre Tentakel krochen in Werkstatt um Werkstatt, ergriffen Magos um Magos. Die Worte binhärischer Mantras wurden verzerrt, der algorithmische Katechismus wurde kompromittiert. Unter einer eisernen Hülle nagte ein böser Wurm am Herz der Welt.
languages.original_text: The foulness that festered in the depths of Kiava Gamma was patient. Its tentacles crept into workshop after workshop, capturing Magos after Magos. The words of binharic mantras were distorted and the algorithmic catechism was compromised. Beneath the shell of iron, a vile worm gnawed at the world's heart.

traits.locale_text: Die Fäulnis, die in den Tiefen von Kiava Gamma brodelte, manifestierte sich nur langsam. Ihre Tentakel krochen in Werkstatt um Werkstatt, ergriffen Magos um Magos. Die Worte binhärischer Mantras wurden verzerrt, der algorithmische Katechismus wurde kompromittiert. Unter einer eisernen Hülle nagte ein böser Wurm am Herz der Welt.

languages.text: Kiava Gama'nın derinliklerine nüfuz etmiş kötülük, sabırlıydı. Dokungaçları usul usul atölye üstüne atölye, Magos üstüne Magos ele geçirdi. İkidil düsturların kelimeleri bozuldu ve algoritmik ilmihâlden taviz verildi. Demirden yüzeylerin altında sinsi bir solucan vardı ve dünyanın kalbini kemiriyordu.
languages.original_text: The foulness that festered in the depths of Kiava Gamma was patient. Its tentacles crept into workshop after workshop, capturing Magos after Magos. The words of binharic mantras were distorted and the algorithmic catechism was compromised. Beneath the shell of iron, a vile worm gnawed at the world's heart.

traits.locale_text: Kiava Gama'nın derinliklerine nüfuz etmiş kötülük, sabırlıydı. Dokungaçları usul usul atölye üstüne atölye, Magos üstüne Magos ele geçirdi. İkidil düsturların kelimeleri bozuldu ve algoritmik ilmihâlden taviz verildi. Demirden yüzeylerin altında sinsi bir solucan vardı ve dünyanın kalbini kemiriyordu.
